description: We all have a favorite shirt — the one that goes with everything and makes us feel like we can conquer anything. A nod to our roots in the West, our Mountain Shirts are made from 100% organic cotton twill flannel and feature Western detailing, classic styling and oversized BDU buttons at the front closure and cuffs.
name: Topo Designs Mountain Shirt - Mens

specs.value: 100% yarn dyed, organic cotton twill flannel ( may shrink slightly after first wash)
